name: Streadata.io API Gallery - HHS Media Services
description: This is a repository of hhs media services APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: HHS Media Services
apis.description: Use this API platform to create sites with text and multimedia content for syndication. CDC, FDA, HHS, and NIH have built syndication sites using this platform, which is available in Java and .NET.
